The *chandwich* package 

@CB2007

```{r}
library(chandwich)
binom_loglik <- function(prob, data) {
  if (prob < 0 || prob > 1) {
    return(-Inf)
   }
   return(dbinom(data[, "y"], data[, "n"], prob, log = TRUE))
}
rat_res <- adjust_loglik(loglik = binom_loglik, data = rats)
plot(rat_res, type = 1:4)
```
